'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}, used in random encounters.

==Usages==
It is used during the scripted interaction [[Tangaloa's Maw]].

== Points of interest ==
* The plants [[Quill Leaf]] and [[Pox Cap]] can be picked from the central area.
title: Swamp
